00255 #if defined( MSC_IF_CHOF ) && defined( MSC_IF_CMOF )
00256 /***************************************************************************/
00263 __STATIC_INLINE void MSC_StartCacheMeasurement(void)
00264 {
00265   /* Clear CMOF and CHOF to catch these later */
00266   MSC->IFC = MSC_IF_CHOF | MSC_IF_CMOF;
00267 
00268   /* Start performance counters */
00269 #if defined( _MSC_CACHECMD_MASK )
00270   MSC->CACHECMD = MSC_CACHECMD_STARTPC;
00271 #else
00272   MSC->CMD = MSC_CMD_STARTPC;
00273 #endif
00274 }
00275 
00276 
00277 /***************************************************************************/
00324 __STATIC_INLINE int32_t MSC_GetCacheMeasurement(void)
00325 {
00326   int32_t total;
00327   /* Stop the counter before computing the hit-rate */
00328 #if defined( _MSC_CACHECMD_MASK )
00329   MSC->CACHECMD = MSC_CACHECMD_STOPPC;
00330 #else
00331   MSC->CMD = MSC_CMD_STOPPC;
00332 #endif
00333 
00334   /* Check for overflows in performance counters */
00335   if (MSC->IF & (MSC_IF_CHOF | MSC_IF_CMOF))
00336     return -2;
00337 
00338   /* Because the hits and misses are volatile, we need to split this up into
00339    * two statements to avoid a compiler warning regarding the order of volatile
00340    * accesses. */
00341   total  = MSC->CACHEHITS;
00342   total += MSC->CACHEMISSES;
00343 
00344   /* To avoid a division by zero. */
00345   if (total == 0)
00346     return -1;
00347 
00348   return (MSC->CACHEHITS * 100) / total;
00349 }
00350 
00351 
00352 /***************************************************************************/
00356 __STATIC_INLINE void MSC_FlushCache(void)
00357 {
00358 #if defined( _MSC_CACHECMD_MASK )
00359   MSC->CACHECMD = MSC_CACHECMD_INVCACHE;
00360 #else
00361   MSC->CMD = MSC_CMD_INVCACHE;
00362 #endif
00363 }
00364

00366 /***************************************************************************/
00372 __STATIC_INLINE void MSC_EnableCache(bool enable)
00373 {
00374   BUS_RegBitWrite(&(MSC->READCTRL), _MSC_READCTRL_IFCDIS_SHIFT, !enable);
00375 }
00376

00406 /***************************************************************************/
00412 __STATIC_INLINE void MSC_BusStrategy(mscBusStrategy_Typedef mode)
00413 {
00414   MSC->READCTRL = (MSC->READCTRL & ~(_MSC_READCTRL_BUSSTRATEGY_MASK)) | mode;
00415 }
00416 #endif
